title: Looking for T206 for a pal.
author: Archive

posts.post_title: Looking for T206 for a pal.
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Kenny
After hours of countless google-ing I found this great site. I'm looking to buy raw T206's. Low grades preferably. 
A colleague of mine used to admire his grandma's small T206 collection and when his grandpa died, his grandma threw them out, so a couple of us have teamed up in search of a few (a dozen or so) to suprise him with during his birthday at work.

If you have any you are looking to sell .. just any ol' condition, let me know.

posts.post_title: Looking for T206 for a pal.
posts.post_content:
Posted By: scott levy
Kenny,

I happen to have around 8 - 10 common T206s that have a really sharp appearance (so they look new) but are slightly trimmed, which destroys their value.  For someone who is looking to admire these T206s it really is the perfect group of cards.

If interested contact me via email and we'll work out something that is fair:
scottglevy@yahoo.com
